name: ORS MAPPA TIER Alerts with OFS and POM
description:
MAPPA TIER Alerts with OFS&POM
Basic Alerts report with TIER and MAPPA alerts pre-selected
Includes OFS/POM
PDD0100 V1.2

tags: PDD0100 V1.2 MAPPA TIER Alerts OFS POM

dataset.name: codes/desc
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) || '  -  ' || (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION) AS ALERT_TYPE_FULL_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_TYPE, AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE, AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION AS ALERT_DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_ALERTS AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS WHERE (AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT' OR AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.PARENT_CODE = AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT_CODE' OR AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL)), dataset_ AS (SELECT ALERT_TYPE_FULL_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, ALERT_CODE, ALERT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Prisoners 1
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY < 'A5000')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Prisoners 2
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY >= 'A5000')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE REHAB_DECISION_CODE = 'NPS')

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE REHAB_DECISION_CODE = 'CPA')

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE REHAB_DECISION_CODE IS NULL)
